Why do you even use Steam if you haven't even tried any of the Half Life games yet??

I threw a soda can at some random a-hole that wanted me to put it in the trash can, only to get beaten to submission to do it.

After that, I joined an uprising, killed some more guys that looked familiar to the guy I threw a soda can at, killed some zombies, met a crazy, yet loyal and pleasant shotgun-wielding preacher in a zombified town, trained some sand bugs to take over a heavily guarded prison, did some teleportation, fought some more guys that wanted me throw a soda can in a trash can, along with some super tall insects with guns and annoying robots with razor blades, then sneaked into a gigantic factory and stopped some old man dictator, just to be warped out of time by a businessman with a brief case, and left in the black void of nothingness.
great progression and well developed story
Good game play it now you have no excuses
